refunds.NotifyInitiate: Refund is initiated for PayRef {{Original.PayRef}} by user {{lastComment.User}} with comments {{lastComment.Text}}
refunds.NotifyInsufficient: {{Original.AcquirerId}} is indicating that account has insufficient funds, raised by user {{lastComment.User}} with comments {{lastComment.Text}}
refunds.NotifyRejected: Refund for  PayRef {{Original.PayRef}} is rejected by user {{lastComment.User}} with comments {{lastComment.Text}}
refunds.NotifyInitiateBatch: Refund Batch Created {{Original.RefundBatchNo}} by user {{Original.INITBy}} containing {{Count}} for {{Original.AcquirerId}}
refunds.NotifyProcessedBatch: Refund Batch Processed {{Original.RefundBatchNo}} by user {{Original.INITBy}} containing {{Count}} for {{Original.AcquirerId}}
refunds.NotifyProcessed: Refund for  PayRef {{Original.PayRef}} is processed by user {{lastComment.User}} with comments {{lastComment.Text}}
